Bludgeon: Id hate to crash the party, but, Kit Kats right. That was too easy. 
 I've known a lot of Leaders in my time, and none of them died that easy.  I 
may be wrong though... all im saying is that we shouldnt right him off that 
easily.  But what ever you say.
::He transforms to beast mode and follows::
